nodes.text: The Zipthar Hexa-crystals were a type of rare and valuable crystals mined in the Zipthar system.
These shimmering, round crystals were formed in a prism-like lattice that bend and reflected light in unusual ways.

During the height of the New Order, Zipthar hexa-crystals were considered rare in the Velcar Free Commerce Zone which strictly controlled all exports. Many smugglers made small fortunes transporting them to various individuals.

In the years following the Battle of Endor, smugglers Reina Gale and Rollos went to Entralla in order to sell crystals to Begas Tok. The deal was interrupted by the intervention of the Pentastar Patrol.
